code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,timeout:10000,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const accountsApi={getAll:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/accounts');return response.data.data;},getByName:async name=>{const response=await api.get("/accounts/".concat(name));return response.data.data;},getByCurrency:async currency=>{const response=await api.get("/accounts/currency/".concat(currency));return response.data.data;},getSummary:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/accounts/summary');return response.data.data;},getExchangeRates:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/accounts/exchange-rates');return response.data.data;}};export const transactionsApi={getAll:async filters=>{const params=new URLSearchParams();if(filters){Object.keys(filters).forEach(key=>{if(filters[key]!==undefined&&filters[key]!==''){params.append(key,filters[key]);}});}const response=await api.get("/transactions?".concat(params));return response.data.data;},create:async transferData=>{const response=await api.post('/transactions',transferData);return response.data.data;}};export default api;
